ISSUE.TITLE: Docker image fails due to UnsupportedClassVersionError
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Running the latest Docker image fails due to a `UnsupportedClassVersionError` error: ```shell > docker run -p 9966:9966 springcommunity/spring-petclinic-rest Unable to find image 'springcommunity/spring-petclinic-rest:latest' locally latest: Pulling from springcommunity/spring-petclinic-rest 604d95fb60b7: Download complete c2342918c835: Download complete 137d3d5eab74: Download complete ff7533051fae: Download complete cb9175752588: Download complete f1ef485e70e2: Download complete 21531c789830: Download complete 8339abd0b07f: Download complete 5a7813e071bf: Download complete Digest: sha256:cd2874ec008edf0d3af0b8faea6591f057699a86cd10aea0fd46f48ccc4f5dc3 Status: Downloaded newer image for springcommunity/spring-petclinic-rest:latest Error: LinkageError occurred while loading main class org.springframework.samples.petclinic.PetClinicApplication java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/springframework/boot/web/servlet/support/SpringBootServletInitializer has been compiled by a more recent version of the Java Runtime (class file version 61.0), this version of the Java Runtime only recognizes class file versions up to 55.0 ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: SonarCloud : configure Jacoco for SonarCloud CI * SonarCloud : configure Jacoco XML format and add badges * SonarCloud : use the maven.jacoco-plugin.version property * SonarCloud : use SonarCloud CI-based analysis

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix Java Compiler version from 11 to 17 #194

Fix Java compiler version to 17 and remove duplicated maven plugin versions #194 (#195) * Fix Java Compiler version from 11 to 17 #194 * Prefer the java.version property from spring-boot-starter-parent * Remove the maven.compiler.release property inherited from the spring-boot-starter-parent * Remove all maven plugin versions inherited from the spring-boot-starter-parent
